result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gerzon Sanchez

defendant.name: Sanchez, Gerzon
defendant.address: 403 Jackson St., Columbia County Jail, Portage, WI 53901

records.addlTxt: per Judge Voigt, called Public Defenders office.  Spoke to Melanie and they are still looking for an attorney for Mr. Sanchez.

9:00 AM Defendant Gerzon Sanchez appeared by video. Attorney Brenda L. Yaskal in court for State of Wisconsin. Court questioned defendant on appointment of successor counsel from Public Defender office.  Defendant has not heard from Public Defender.  DA Yaskal stated on August 1,2022 hearing court would not appoint counsel as is public defender eligible.  Court staff will be in touch with public defender office.  Court asked about motions filed by defendant.  Neither party had a position on court ruling on those today.  Statement by defendant prior public defender representation.  Court will contact public defender.  9:15 am
Motion hearing on September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Order to Withdraw as Counsel
filed by attorney Cornia
to Withdraw as Counsel filed by Atty Cornia
to Disclose Discovery filed by defendant
Motion to Move Case to Madison for Trial - filed by defendant

11:50 AM Prosecuting attorney Brenda L. Yaskal by video Zoom, for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Gerzon Sanchez appeared by phone Zoom, in custody at Columbia County Jail.  Attorney Reed Cornia by video Zoom, for Gerzon Sanchez. Court addressed the letter filed by defendant. Court will not appoint counsel for the defendant. Reasons were put on the record. Defendant hung up. Court will proceed with hearing. Attorney Cornia addressed concerns proceeding as defendants attorney. Attorney Cornia is to send an order and motion to withdraw, court will sign. Public defenders office will need to appoint a new attorney. 11:59 AM
Filed by Attorney Cornia - reset request
Status conference on August 1, 2022 at 11:30 am.
for Court Appointed Attorney filed by defendant
Appointed Attorney Reed Cornia

1:21 PM Prosecuting attorney Brenda L. Yaskal in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Gerzon Sanchez in court in custody from the Columbia County Jail. Attorney Melville Peter Middleton II in court for Gerzon Sanchez. Information filed, waived reading. Defendant stood mute, not guilty pleas, will set for trial. Statements by defendant re: denied drug test, request new counsel. Atty Middleton makes motion to withdraw. Statement by Court, grants motion. Discussion re: defendant's motion for speedy trial demand. State request confirmation defendant withdraws. Defendant states he is withdrawing his motion for a speedy trial. Status conference to be set after defendant finds new counsel. 1:33 PM
Copy of discovery letter to Atty Middleton from Atty Lippert
Arraignment on May 13, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
requesting a speedy trial, tolled time and trial to be held out of county filed by defendant
Preliminary Hearing 4/1/22 filed by Court Reporter Marjorie Kurtz
Arraignment on April 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.

1:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Peggy A. Crooks-Mishacoff in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Gerzon Sanchez in court in custody from the Columbia County Jail.  Attorney Melville Peter Middleton II in court for Gerzon Sanchez. State called Officer David Pugh from the Wisconsin Dells Police Department sworn 1:38 p.m. Testimony taken, 2:11 p.m. witness excused. Argument by defendant, Statement by Court. State request bindover. Defense objects with argument. Court found probable cause, bound over. Arraignment scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 09:30 am. 2:38 PM
Preliminary hearing on April 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

of Judge filed by Atty Middleton
Preliminary hearing on May 20, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

11:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Brenda L. Yaskal appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Gerzon Sanchez appeared in court, in custody. Attorney Claire Edwards appeared in court on behalf of Attorney Melville Peter Middleton II for Gerzon Sanchez.  Attorney Middleton has requested by letter to have this reset. Attorney Edwards spoke with Attorney Middleton this morning and they do not wish to dispute the findings. Court found the defendant competent according to the doctors report. This will be set accordingly. 11:13 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Pretrial 1-31-22 at 2:40 pm and Return date 2-16-22 at 10:00 am

No contact with K.C., her residence, vehicle, or work place. May return 1x with law enforcement to get personal belongings. May not possess any weapon that fires a projectile. Not leave the State of WI w/o prior written court approval.
Return date on February 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:38 PM Prosecuting attorney Kevin R. Calkins appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Gerzon Sanchez appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Claire M Edwards appeared by video for Gerzon Sanchez. Waived reading of complaint. Advisement of rights. Bond argument. Address updated to 610 S. Frontage Rd. Wis. Dells. Court set $50,000.00 cash bond. Standard felony conditions. Not leave the State of WI w/o prior written court approval. No contact with K.C., her residence, vehicle, or place of employment. May return 1x with law enforcement to get personal property. May not possess any weapon that fires a projectile. Time limits for preliminary hearing waived. 1:47 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 31, 2022 at 02:40 pm.
Return date scheduled for February 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
